paris.name: Paris, France
paris.text: The 'City of Love' famous for the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and charming cafés along the Seine River.

rome.name: Rome, Italy
rome.text: Ancient capital with iconic landmarks like the Colosseum, Vatican City, and Trevi Fountain.

newYork.name: New York City, USA
newYork.text: The bustling metropolis known for Times Square, Statue of Liberty, and Central Park.

tokyo.name: Tokyo, Japan
tokyo.text: High-tech city blending futuristic skyscrapers with traditional temples and cherry blossoms.

london.name: London, UK
london.text: Historic city featuring Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, and the Tower of London.

barcelona.name: Barcelona, Spain
barcelona.text: Vibrant city with Gaudí's Sagrada Família, La Rambla, and beautiful Mediterranean beaches.

sydney.name: Sydney, Australia
sydney.text: Coastal city known for its iconic Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and Bondi Beach.

rio.name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
rio.text: Famous for Christ the Redeemer statue, Copacabana Beach, and Carnival celebrations.

dubai.name: Dubai, UAE
dubai.text: Ultra-modern city with the Burj Khalifa, Palm Islands, and luxury shopping malls.
